request: help plan my weekend with these activities, with clear timestamp: üîê Step-by-Step: Securing IP for Your Agentic Framework...

activity.title: Weekend: IP Protection for Agentic Framework
activity.description: Comprehensive plan to secure intellectual property including trademark, copyright, and provisional patent filings for JournalMate

tasks.title: üìù Document Agentic Workflow and IP Foundation
tasks.description: Create timestamped record of generatePlan(), adjustForWeather(), syncCalendar(), suggestFallbacks() modules. Include behavioral nudging logic, fallback routines, Claude Code guardrails, and adaptation mechanisms. This becomes foundation for all IP filings.

tasks.title: üîç Search Trademark Availability (USPTO TESS)
tasks.description: Search JournalMate brand name, logo, and tagline availability on USPTO TESS database. Check Class 9 (software) and Class 42 (SaaS) classifications.

tasks.title: ‚Ñ¢Ô∏è File Trademark Application
tasks.description: Submit trademark application via USPTO.gov for JournalMate name, logo, and tagline 'Build routines. Build habits. Share it with the world.' Include all brand assets and specify software/SaaS classes.

tasks.title: ¬©Ô∏è Register Copyright for Source Code
tasks.description: Register copyright at copyright.gov for Python/TypeScript codebase, including all agentic prompt logic and fallback flows. Prepare code submission package.

tasks.title: ¬©Ô∏è Register Copyright for Brand Assets and UI
tasks.description: Register copyright for logo, onboarding copy, journaling UI designs, and written content. Compile all visual and textual materials for submission.

tasks.title: üìê Create Technical Abstract for Patent
tasks.description: Write detailed technical abstract describing agentic execution engine: intent-to-plan conversion with timestamps, weather/traffic adaptation, energy rhythm detection, fallback logic, and journaling hooks.

tasks.title: üìä Prepare Patent Diagrams and Flowcharts
tasks.description: Create visual documentation: system architecture diagrams, agentic workflow flowcharts, and pseudocode for key algorithms. Strengthen patent claim with clear technical illustrations.

tasks.title: üß™ File Provisional Patent Application
tasks.description: Submit provisional patent via USPTO Patent Portal with complete technical abstract, diagrams, flowcharts, and pseudocode. Covers agentic execution engine, fallback routines, and behavioral nudging system. Provides 12-month window for full patent.

activity_card.title: Weekend: IP Protection for Agentic Framework
